ceo_nodes.description: HIDDEN
ceo_nodes.title: HIDDEN

description.last_approved_text: Their peers might consider them bossy, but this youngster demonstrates authority and decisiveness in their actions.

ceo_nodes.description: Their peers might consider them bossy, but this youngster demonstrates authority and decisiveness in their actions.
ceo_nodes.title: Good Manager

description.last_approved_text: This one is never sedentary, and always indulges in the joys of the hunt.

ceo_nodes.description: This one is never sedentary, and always indulges in the joys of the hunt.
ceo_nodes.title: Enjoys Hunting

description.last_approved_text: For some youngsters, preferring one's own company is a sign of unique strengths.

ceo_nodes.description: For some youngsters, preferring one's own company is a sign of unique strengths.
ceo_nodes.title: Introvert

description.last_approved_text: Do not mistake a keen interest in stately affairs as merely the nosiness of youth.

ceo_nodes.description: Do not mistake a keen interest in stately affairs as merely the nosiness of youth.
ceo_nodes.title: Courtier

description.last_approved_text: The level-headedness to negotiate and reconcile fairly is a rare quality in one so young.

ceo_nodes.description: The level-headedness to negotiate and reconcile fairly is a rare quality in one so young.
ceo_nodes.title: Arbiter

description.last_approved_text: A zealously made point, delivered with wild-eyed conviction, can inspire and incite even the staunchest non-believer.

ceo_nodes.description: A zealously made point, delivered with wild-eyed conviction, can inspire and incite even the staunchest non-believer.
ceo_nodes.title: Preacher

description.last_approved_text: "We might be vastly outnumbered, but never underestimate the element of surprise!"

ceo_nodes.description: "We might be vastly outnumbered, but never underestimate the element of surprise!"
ceo_nodes.title: Guerrilla

description.last_approved_text: This person is a willing subversionist who has no qualms about undermining their enemies by any means necessary.

ceo_nodes.description: This person is a willing subversionist who has no qualms about undermining their enemies by any means necessary.
ceo_nodes.title: Saboteur

description.last_approved_text: Always working behind the scenes, this individual is a master of intrigue.

ceo_nodes.description: Always working behind the scenes, this individual is a master of intrigue.
ceo_nodes.title: Manipulator

description.last_approved_text: "Trespassing, stealing, call it whatever you want. If the land has what I need, I shall take it."

ceo_nodes.description: "Trespassing, stealing, call it whatever you want. If the land has what I need, I shall take it."
ceo_nodes.title: Poacher

description.last_approved_text: Accepted by their surrogate family, but nevertheless still a fish out of water.

ceo_nodes.description: Accepted by their surrogate family, but nevertheless still a fish out of water.
ceo_nodes.title: Outsider

description.last_approved_text: When war comes, those who stay ready are first to be called.

ceo_nodes.description: When war comes, those who stay ready are first to be called.
ceo_nodes.title: Militant

description.last_approved_text: People skills, coupled to an aptitude for business, make this one a crafty merchant indeed.

ceo_nodes.description: People skills, coupled to an aptitude for business, make this one a crafty merchant indeed.
ceo_nodes.title: Trader

description.last_approved_text: There is no worse enemy than bad advice, and few better friends than a wise confidant.

ceo_nodes.description: There is no worse enemy than bad advice, and few better friends than a wise confidant.
ceo_nodes.title: Advisor

description.last_approved_text: To lead a community takes confidence, focus and integrity, which this one has in abundance.

ceo_nodes.description: To lead a community takes confidence, focus and integrity, which this one has in abundance.
ceo_nodes.title: Village Chief

description.last_approved_text: It is better to have an army of donkeys led by a tiger, than an army of tigers led by a donkey.

ceo_nodes.description: It is better to have an army of donkeys led by a tiger, than an army of tigers led by a donkey.
ceo_nodes.title: Officer

description.last_approved_text: Any simpleton can wield a weapon and fight, but a resolute acceptance of death marks out the true warrior.

ceo_nodes.description: Any simpleton can wield a weapon and fight, but a resolute acceptance of death marks out the true warrior.
ceo_nodes.title: Warrior

description.last_approved_text: A stalwart protector, they never fall asleep at their post.

ceo_nodes.description: A stalwart protector, they never fall asleep at their post.
ceo_nodes.title: Guard

description.last_approved_text: When it comes to strategy and battlefield manoeuvres, the devil is very much in the detail.

ceo_nodes.description: When it comes to strategy and battlefield manoeuvres, the devil is very much in the detail.
ceo_nodes.title: Tactician

description.last_approved_text: "Brigandry is only a crime if you get caught – until then, it’s a bona fide vocation…"

ceo_nodes.description: "Brigandry is only a crime if you get caught – until then, it’s a bona fide vocation…"
ceo_nodes.title: Bandit

description.last_approved_text: Conflict must be prevented by any means necessary.

ceo_nodes.description: Conflict must be prevented by any means necessary.
ceo_nodes.title: Peacekeeper

description.last_approved_text: Paying close attention to detail, this one is always aware of the goings-on in their jurisdiction.

ceo_nodes.description: Paying close attention to detail, this one is always aware of the goings-on in their jurisdiction.
ceo_nodes.title: Inspector

description.last_approved_text: An expert notary, they know that effective record-keeping is only achieved through stubborn diligence.

ceo_nodes.description: An expert notary, they know that effective record-keeping is only achieved through stubborn diligence.
ceo_nodes.title: Clerk

description.last_approved_text: This one sees the value of institutionalised learning, and has embraced it.

ceo_nodes.description: This one sees the value of institutionalised learning, and has embraced it.
ceo_nodes.title: Academic

description.last_approved_text: "This is what real hard work smells like – blood, sweat and animal faeces."

ceo_nodes.description: "This is what real hard work smells like – blood, sweat and animal faeces."
ceo_nodes.title: Farmer

description.last_approved_text: An important cog of law administration, who is no stranger to the pressures of bureaucracy.

ceo_nodes.description: An important cog of law administration, who is no stranger to the pressures of bureaucracy.
ceo_nodes.title: Magistrate

description.last_approved_text: Always led by conviction, this one exhibits clear bias in their opinions.

ceo_nodes.description: Always led by conviction, this one exhibits clear bias in their opinions.
ceo_nodes.title: Partisan

description.last_approved_text: Tax collection is a necessary evil, as are its instruments.

ceo_nodes.description: Tax collection is a necessary evil, as are its instruments.
ceo_nodes.title: Tax Collector

description.last_approved_text: This person knows how to divide the cake in such a way that everyone believes they have the biggest slice.

ceo_nodes.description: This person knows how to divide the cake in such a way that everyone believes they have the biggest slice.
ceo_nodes.title: Mediator

description.last_approved_text: "Respect for parents, elders, and ancestors is the root of all virtue, the stem from which all moral teachings grow."

ceo_nodes.description: "Respect for parents, elders, and ancestors is the root of all virtue, the stem from which all moral teachings grow."
ceo_nodes.title: Filial & Pious

description.last_approved_text: Ranging forward, this general guards the troops against threats from without.

ceo_nodes.description: Ranging forward, this general guards the troops against threats from without.
ceo_nodes.title: Scout

description.last_approved_text: Expert with the bow, they are able to strike their quarry from quite a distance.

ceo_nodes.description: Expert with the bow, they are able to strike their quarry from quite a distance.
ceo_nodes.title: Hunter

description.last_approved_text: Keen eyesight enables this person to spot the enemy clearly, even under cover of night.

ceo_nodes.description: Keen eyesight enables this person to spot the enemy clearly, even under cover of night.
ceo_nodes.title: Lookout

description.last_approved_text: Like the archetypal scoundrel, this one is wayward and unprincipled in their actions.

ceo_nodes.description: Like the archetypal scoundrel, this one is wayward and unprincipled in their actions.
ceo_nodes.title: Rogue

description.last_approved_text: Travelling the land and living off your wits? That is true freedom.

ceo_nodes.description: Travelling the land and living off your wits? That is true freedom.
ceo_nodes.title: Wanderer

description.last_approved_text: Cai Mao is adept of naval combat, and a budding admiral.

ceo_nodes.description: Cai Mao is adept of naval combat, and a budding admiral.
ceo_nodes.title: Competent Sailor

description.last_approved_text: Cao Ang’s fate is to one day be prince of the House of Cao, be it in life or in death.

ceo_nodes.description: Cao Ang’s fate is to one day be prince of the House of Cao, be it in life or in death.
ceo_nodes.title: Prince Min

description.last_approved_text: The wily Cao Cao sees opportunity in the hardships of others, skewing things to his advantage.

ceo_nodes.description: The wily Cao Cao sees opportunity in the hardships of others, skewing things to his advantage.
ceo_nodes.title: Strategic Mastermind

description.last_approved_text: "In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times."

ceo_nodes.description: "In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times."
ceo_nodes.title: Political Animal

description.last_approved_text: The skills of a fearless outdoorsman – horse-riding, archery, and hunting – make Cao Ren a valued battlefield ally.

ceo_nodes.description: The skills of a fearless outdoorsman – horse-riding, archery, and hunting – make Cao Ren a valued battlefield ally.
ceo_nodes.title: Brave Hunter

ceo_nodes.description: Cao Cao's nephew. When Cao Cao first raised his flag, he traveled from the far-off Wu District to join him.For this, Cao Cao praised him, saying "He is my clan's 1000-Ii (league) Horse."After losing his father at a young age, Cao Cao took him in as a new son.
ceo_nodes.title: Swift Stallion

description.last_approved_text: Chen Gong knows that even great men are imperfect, and righteousness is often not immediately obvious.

ceo_nodes.description: Chen Gong knows that even great men are imperfect, and righteousness is often not immediately obvious.
ceo_nodes.title: Master Magistrate

description.last_approved_text: 'The General of the Household Who Defeats Bandits' is living proof that bravery can overcome adversity.

ceo_nodes.description: 'The General of the Household Who Defeats Bandits' is living proof that bravery can overcome adversity.
ceo_nodes.title: Bandit Killer

ceo_nodes.description: Although he was originally a minister, he became a general with a long history with Wei after his talents as a commander was discovered by Sima Yi who then granted him troops. As he often enjoyed looking at maps, he became skilled in using the terrain to his advantage often making use of these in the battles with Shu.
ceo_nodes.title: Audacious Commander

description.last_approved_text: "Such prowess! This is old Elai again!"

ceo_nodes.description: "Such prowess! This is old Elai again!"
ceo_nodes.title: Brute of Unmatched Power

ceo_nodes.description: An officer of Wu who fought in many battles, serving Wu over a long period of time. His frightening appearance and overly thick arms may have scared many, but at heart he was a poet who loved beautiful scenery.
ceo_nodes.title: Fierce Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Consumed by his hunger for power, Dong Zhuo's despotism knows no bounds.

ceo_nodes.description: Consumed by his hunger for power, Dong Zhuo's despotism knows no bounds.
ceo_nodes.title: Cruel Tyrant

description.last_approved_text: The intelligent and vengeful Fa Zheng should not be crossed, lest you become the target of his deadly schemes.

ceo_nodes.description: The intelligent and vengeful Fa Zheng should not be crossed, lest you become the target of his deadly schemes.
ceo_nodes.title: Vindictive Strategist

ceo_nodes.description: Fan Chou is a serious man who speaks his mind, others don't always take it so well...
ceo_nodes.title: Stern General

description.last_approved_text: "Cao Cao may have Zhang Liao, but I have Gan Ning! Thus we are evenly matched."

ceo_nodes.description: "Cao Cao may have Zhang Liao, but I have Gan Ning! Thus we are evenly matched."
ceo_nodes.title: Pirate of the Bells

description.last_approved_text: Ever the rebel, Gao Gan’s true allegiances shall only die when he does.

ceo_nodes.description: Ever the rebel, Gao Gan’s true allegiances shall only die when he does.
ceo_nodes.title: Loyal Nephew

ceo_nodes.description: No formation can withstand Gao Shun.
ceo_nodes.title: Formation Breaker

description.last_approved_text: Far from being just a heartless bandit, Gong Du is a principled soldier of honour.

ceo_nodes.description: Far from being just a heartless bandit, Gong Du is a principled soldier of honour.
ceo_nodes.title: Master of the Land

description.last_approved_text: In war, Gongsun Du does what is required of him; he revels in bloodshed and conquest.

ceo_nodes.description: In war, Gongsun Du does what is required of him; he revels in bloodshed and conquest.
ceo_nodes.title: the Warlike

description.last_approved_text: Defence of the frontiers requires more than just the resources of a warlord, but also a merciless attitude.

ceo_nodes.description: Defence of the frontiers requires more than just the resources of a warlord, but also a merciless attitude.
ceo_nodes.title: The Iron Fist General

ceo_nodes.description: Originally the second son of Guan Ding of Hebei, he became the adopted son of Guan Yu after his father became impressed with Guan Yu in a fateful encounter. Earnest and true, he joined Liu Bei as a sign of respect to his adopted father wherein he became proficient in martial arts.
ceo_nodes.title: Next Generation Warrior

ceo_nodes.description: Growing up as the son of Guan Yu, he became an honest and hard-working warrior who always greeted anyone he met with sincerity. This trait made him very popular with the common people while his earnest innocence gained him popularity among many women.
ceo_nodes.title: Earnest Commander

ceo_nodes.description: As the son of Guan Yu, he often kept to himself but grew to be highly capable at anything he tried. Despite his young age, he experienced many battles as he fought alongside Zhang Bao in the Northern Campaign, and his skills earned him praise from many including Zhuge Liang himself who expressed high hopes for Guan Xing throughout his life.
ceo_nodes.title: God of Wars' Successor

description.last_approved_text: A famed warrior and righteous slayer of all who dare oppose him, Guan Yu’s deification is already assured.

ceo_nodes.description: A famed warrior and righteous slayer of all who dare oppose him, Guan Yu’s deification is already assured.
ceo_nodes.title: God of War

ceo_nodes.description: Indebted to Xiahou Yuan and Sima Yu, he became an active officer of Wei in the many battles against Shu. Although sickly and frequently coughing, he proved his unquestionable loyalty and value on the battlefield.
ceo_nodes.title: The Ardent Loyalist

description.last_approved_text: Guo Jia is a confidant of unparalleled foresight – to ignore his counsel is to invite failure and defeat.

ceo_nodes.description: Guo Jia is a confidant of unparalleled foresight – to ignore his counsel is to invite failure and defeat.
ceo_nodes.title: Astute Advisor

ceo_nodes.description: His brutality both on and off the battlefield makes Guo Si a man worth fearing
ceo_nodes.title: Brutal Henchman

ceo_nodes.description: Han Dang, originally a footman from Liaoxi Province, was discovered by Sun Jian wherein he went on to serve Wu as a naval leader. He became a veteran general under Wu wherein he served the Sun family for three generations.
ceo_nodes.title: Grumbling Commander

description.last_approved_text: Using his ability to manage food supplies with tireless efficiency, Han Fu is a most valuable logistician.

ceo_nodes.description: Using his ability to manage food supplies with tireless efficiency, Han Fu is a most valuable logistician.
ceo_nodes.title: Diligent Agriculturalist

ceo_nodes.description: Han Hao understands the importance of keeping the people fed.
ceo_nodes.title: Agricultural Advocate

description.last_approved_text: Insurrection is in Han Sui’s blood. To him, subservience cannot be permanent.

ceo_nodes.description: Insurrection is in Han Sui’s blood. To him, subservience cannot be permanent.
ceo_nodes.title: Tireless Insurgent

description.last_approved_text: "I am He Man, the devil who shoots across the sky! Who dares challenge me?"

ceo_nodes.description: "I am He Man, the devil who shoots across the sky! Who dares challenge me?"
ceo_nodes.title: The Most Powerful

description.last_approved_text: With unwavering faith, He Yi inspires others to follow in his righteous footsteps.

ceo_nodes.description: With unwavering faith, He Yi inspires others to follow in his righteous footsteps.
ceo_nodes.title: Leader of the People

description.last_approved_text: With a head shaped like a leopard’s and ape-like shoulders, Hua Xiong’s ferocity is matched by his appearance.

ceo_nodes.description: With a head shaped like a leopard’s and ape-like shoulders, Hua Xiong’s ferocity is matched by his appearance.
ceo_nodes.title: Fierce Beast

description.last_approved_text: His outward demeanour belies his real allegiances – Huang Gai truly is the very definition of inscrutability.

ceo_nodes.description: His outward demeanour belies his real allegiances – Huang Gai truly is the very definition of inscrutability.
ceo_nodes.title: Unreadable Warrior

description.last_approved_text: All uprisings, no matter how widespread, stand little chance of success without strong leadership.

ceo_nodes.description: All uprisings, no matter how widespread, stand little chance of success without strong leadership.
ceo_nodes.title: Wielder of the Heavenly Way

description.last_approved_text: The venerable Huang Zhong, to whom age is just a number, is frequently underestimated in battle.

ceo_nodes.description: The venerable Huang Zhong, to whom age is just a number, is frequently underestimated in battle.
ceo_nodes.title: of the Ageless Strength

description.last_approved_text: Huang Zu likes to start offensives on the front foot, from a safe distance and out of sight.

ceo_nodes.description: Huang Zu likes to start offensives on the front foot, from a safe distance and out of sight.
ceo_nodes.title: Ranged Ambusher

description.last_approved_text: In the brutal business of war, there is no better teacher than experience.

ceo_nodes.description: In the brutal business of war, there is no better teacher than experience.
ceo_nodes.title: Aged General

ceo_nodes.description: Yuan Shu's greatest general wielding a large and heavy trident
ceo_nodes.title: Trident Wielder

ceo_nodes.description: As the son of Jia Kui of Wei, he grew to be a notable officer and a powerful politician. Seeing his skills, Sima Yi placed him on his side as a confidant along with Sima Shi and Sima Zhao.
ceo_nodes.title: Ruthless Retainer

description.last_approved_text: Jia Long may dedicate much time to forethought, yet still lacks caution now and then.

ceo_nodes.description: Jia Long may dedicate much time to forethought, yet still lacks caution now and then.
ceo_nodes.title: Short-sighted Peacekeeper

description.last_approved_text: Decisions made in secret can have the deadliest outcomes.

ceo_nodes.description: Decisions made in secret can have the deadliest outcomes.
ceo_nodes.title: The Blade in the Dark

ceo_nodes.description: Whether acting as messenger or waging war, Jian Yong's sense of humour never fails.
ceo_nodes.title: Light Hearted Envoy

description.last_approved_text: Known for being an expert general despite his inexperience, Jiang Wei has a precocious talent for war.

ceo_nodes.description: Known for being an expert general despite his inexperience, Jiang Wei has a precocious talent for war.
ceo_nodes.title: Budding Commander

description.last_approved_text: Kong Rong claims descent from the great Confucius himself, attested to by his remarkable wit and scholarly fame.

ceo_nodes.description: Kong Rong claims descent from the great Confucius himself, attested to by his remarkable wit and scholarly fame.
ceo_nodes.title: Master Scholar

description.last_approved_text: A master at the art of Qingtan, Kong Zhou utilises discussion and debate as a means of intellectual self-improvement.

ceo_nodes.description: A master at the art of Qingtan, Kong Zhou utilises discussion and debate as a means of intellectual self-improvement.
ceo_nodes.title: Pure Conversationalist

ceo_nodes.description: With a cool head Kuai Liang can lay be relied upon to lay out an effective strategy to deal with any threat.
ceo_nodes.title: Sub Zero Strategist

ceo_nodes.description: A very effective administrator, having Kuai Yue on your side is always of great benefit.
ceo_nodes.title: Effective Administrator

ceo_nodes.description: Born as the third daughter of the Bao family, she went on to follow Guan Suo after the two met on the battlefield wherein she became interested in him. She had a fearless personality and was often seen beaming with cheer and positivity.
ceo_nodes.title: Spirited Optimism

ceo_nodes.description: A humble woman of dignity, intelligence and refinement. All have respect for Lady Bian
ceo_nodes.title: Lady of Virtue

ceo_nodes.description: An attendant of Sun Shangxiang who was Bu Zhi's daughter and a member of a once prominent family that had fallen from grace. She was hired for her skills in battle to act as a bodyguard for Sun Shangxiang.
ceo_nodes.title: Elegant Guardian

ceo_nodes.description: Lady Cai spins a web of plots and lies to have her son Liu Cong become heir.
ceo_nodes.title: The Spider

ceo_nodes.description: As the daughter of Cai Yong of the Later Han, she was once abducted by the Xiongnu tribe during one of their raids but was later saved by Cao Cao. Praised for her beauty and skills in music, it was often said that she hid great wisdom and strength behind her quiet and weary demeanor.
ceo_nodes.title: Melancholic Poet

ceo_nodes.description: Daughter of Qiao Xuan and future wife of Sun Ce. With her younger sister, Xiaoqiao, she was known as one of the beautiful "Two Qiaos."Born with a gentle soul, she learned how to fight after her strong desire to aid her husband overcame her aversion to battles.
ceo_nodes.title: Gentle Flower

ceo_nodes.description: Raised by Wang Yun as his own daughter, Diaochan, a skilled singer and dancer, considered the most beautiful woman in all of China.
ceo_nodes.title: The Most Beautiful

ceo_nodes.description: Granddaughter of Dong Zhuo, she was doted on by her grandfather and was often given land and fortune even at a young age.Although willful and cruel, she took on a charming persona whenever Dong Zhuo was about.
ceo_nodes.title: Princess of Thorns

ceo_nodes.description: Naive and pitiable, beautiful and delicate, Lady Feng is loved by men and hated by women.
ceo_nodes.title: Gentle Flower

ceo_nodes.description: The daughter of Guan Yu and sister to Guan Ping, Guan Xing, and Guan Suo, Guan Yinping showed great talent on the battlefield after originally learning martial arts for self-defense. Although she possessed enviable strength, she herself was oblivious to the fact.
ceo_nodes.title: Lady of Great Strength

ceo_nodes.description: Wife of Zhuge Liang, daughter of Huang Chengyan. She chose to fight as a way to support her husband and execute his strategies. Not only was she an able fighter, but she was also well versed in astronomy, geography, strategy, and other fields of learning and continually aided Zhuge Liang from the shadows. Her natural grace gave her a commanding presence on the field of battle.
ceo_nodes.title: Graceful Dragon

ceo_nodes.description: Turbulent violence behind a beautiful facade.
ceo_nodes.title: Viscious Concubine

ceo_nodes.description: The daughter of Lu Bu, she possessed an extraordinary fighting ability much like her father, and has the courage to stand on the front lines of any battle.
ceo_nodes.title: Brave Warrior Princess

description.last_approved_text: As surely as the sun rises, the Lady will always endeavour to get her way.

ceo_nodes.description: As surely as the sun rises, the Lady will always endeavour to get her way.
ceo_nodes.title: The Rising Sun

ceo_nodes.description: As a daughter of the Wang family of Hanzhong, she vowed revenge on Ma Chao after her entire family was slaughtered in Western Liang. Although she served as a leader of the Wei forces, she was typically distant from others and only engaged people when her goals required it.
ceo_nodes.title: Warrior of Vengeance

ceo_nodes.description: As the daughter of the Wei minister, Wang Su, she showed both intelligence and courage from a young age. Although extremely polite and kind to those weaker than her, she openly spoke her mind to those she considered family.
ceo_nodes.title: The Clairvoyant

ceo_nodes.description: Wife to Zhang Fei, niece to Xiahou Yuan, and cousin to Xiahou Ba, her shy nature was the result of having spent the majority of her life at home, being brought up with care.One fateful day while playing in the woods, she met Zhang Fei, who then took her as his wife.
ceo_nodes.title: The Timid Princess

ceo_nodes.description: Daughter of Qiao Xuan and future wife of Zhou Yu. With her older sister Daqiao, she was known as one of the beautiful "Two Qiaos." She had a certain innocence and naiveté about her; it is said that she joined her husband on the battlefield partly on a whim. For this reason, she often showed a rare sort of courage on the battlefield.
ceo_nodes.title: Pure Flower

ceo_nodes.description: The daughter of Xin Pi of Wei, older sister to Xin Chang, and aunt to Yang Hu, her clever and observant nature saved her family from threats numerous times.
ceo_nodes.title: Vigilant Mind

ceo_nodes.description: Zhang Chunhua was well-known for her intelligence, a caring mother to two talented sons, Sima Shi and Sima Zhao, and a loving wife to Sima Yi. Although her face was never without a smile, she was feared by those in her family.
ceo_nodes.title: Mother Hen

ceo_nodes.description: As the daughter of Zhang Fei, she was born in chaotic times and grew up surrounded by the mighty warriors that followed Liu Bei. After her decision to stand on the battlefield, she made it her calling to protect Liu Bei's son, Liu Shan, from any that would harm him. Unlike her father, she was a calm warrior who never let her emotions run rampant.
ceo_nodes.title: Stoic Bodyguard

ceo_nodes.description: A true Femme Fatale, Zhenji was known to have skin as smooth as a gem and a face as lovely as a flower. Although she had a passion for music and song, she was often difficult to approach due to her cold, distant personality and her majestic and dignified mannerism.
ceo_nodes.title: Alluring Flower

ceo_nodes.description: The wife of Meng Huo, Zhurong was a determined fighter who had the tendency to mother all those around her. Much like her namesake, a name she received after declaring herself as the descendant of the legendary god of fire, Zhurong, she was straightforward and aggressive but was also strongly supportive of her husband both in battle and in his duties as King.
ceo_nodes.title: The Zealous Flame

ceo_nodes.description: A warrior who joined Cao Cao's army from its birth, Li Dian had an easygoing personality and a clever mind. He was skilled in predicting the locations of enemy ambushes and traps, yet, due to his laid-back personality, he sometimes caused confusion among his peers.
ceo_nodes.title: Enigmatic Persona

description.last_approved_text: Li Han draws information to himself; so well-regarded is his knowledge that he often fears his life is jeopardised by what he knows.

ceo_nodes.description: Li Han draws information to himself; so well-regarded is his knowledge that he often fears his life is jeopardised by what he knows.
ceo_nodes.title: Keeper of Secrets

ceo_nodes.description: Cruelty is second nature to Li Jue.
ceo_nodes.title: Merciless Officer

description.last_approved_text: Behind every despot’s schemes is the intellect of a consummate strategist.

ceo_nodes.description: Behind every despot’s schemes is the intellect of a consummate strategist.
ceo_nodes.title: Vicious Shadow

ceo_nodes.description: Liao Hua is a man who's loyalty never wavers.
ceo_nodes.title: Devoted Retainer

description.last_approved_text: For some men, war is a chance to prove one’s self and seek adventure.

ceo_nodes.description: For some men, war is a chance to prove one’s self and seek adventure.
ceo_nodes.title: Daring Errant

description.last_approved_text: Despite having come from modest beginnings, the blood of ancient Han emperors flows through Liu Bei’s veins.

ceo_nodes.description: Despite having come from modest beginnings, the blood of ancient Han emperors flows through Liu Bei’s veins.
ceo_nodes.title: Virtuous Idealist

description.last_approved_text: A man seldom ruffled, Liu Biao demonstrates his aristocratic pedigree through stable officiality.

ceo_nodes.description: A man seldom ruffled, Liu Biao demonstrates his aristocratic pedigree through stable officiality.
ceo_nodes.title: Gentleman of the Han

ceo_nodes.description: Liu Cong's ambitions lead him to usurp the position of heir from his brother Liu Qi
ceo_nodes.title: Ambitious Usurper

description.last_approved_text: In spite of the harsh realities of palace life, Liu Dai conducts himself according to his nature: with kindness and benevolence.

ceo_nodes.description: In spite of the harsh realities of palace life, Liu Dai conducts himself according to his nature: with kindness and benevolence.
ceo_nodes.title: Generous Attendant

ceo_nodes.description: Envious of his brother, Liu Qi fully intends to rule.
ceo_nodes.title: Of Great Envy

ceo_nodes.description: Liu shan enjoys his creature comforts and is easily swayed by advisors, his lack of backbone could be his downfall.
ceo_nodes.title: In the Shadow of Greatness

description.last_approved_text: While no longer leading their people, they still strive to bring peace to the land.

ceo_nodes.description: While no longer leading their people, they still strive to bring peace to the land.
ceo_nodes.title: Former Emperor

description.last_approved_text: Some men just want to watch the world burn, while others use the opportunities placed before them.

ceo_nodes.description: Some men just want to watch the world burn, while others use the opportunities placed before them.
ceo_nodes.title: Opportunistic Ruler

description.last_approved_text: Liu Yao appears to be a ‘yes’ man, but is nevertheless known for his staunch incorruptibility.

ceo_nodes.description: Liu Yao appears to be a ‘yes’ man, but is nevertheless known for his staunch incorruptibility.
ceo_nodes.title: Welcoming Magistrate

description.last_approved_text: Liu Yu’s rapport with foreigners and minorities has enabled him to amass considerable wealth from trade.

ceo_nodes.description: Liu Yu’s rapport with foreigners and minorities has enabled him to amass considerable wealth from trade.
ceo_nodes.title: Prosperous Trader

description.last_approved_text: A timid and suspicious noble, Liu Zhang displays a willingness to avoid war, even if that means surrender.

ceo_nodes.description: A timid and suspicious noble, Liu Zhang displays a willingness to avoid war, even if that means surrender.
ceo_nodes.title: Proponent of Peace

description.last_approved_text: With unpredictable loyalty and unsurpassed martial skill, Lü Bu is the most dangerous warrior beneath the heavens.

ceo_nodes.description: With unpredictable loyalty and unsurpassed martial skill, Lü Bu is the most dangerous warrior beneath the heavens.
ceo_nodes.title: Warrior Without Equal

description.last_approved_text: Go is not just an abstract game of strategy – it is a measure of one’s aptitude in tactical forethought.

ceo_nodes.description: Go is not just an abstract game of strategy – it is a measure of one’s aptitude in tactical forethought.
ceo_nodes.title: Go Master

description.last_approved_text: Despite becoming literate late on in his career, Lü Meng has proved himself a most able scholar.

ceo_nodes.description: Despite becoming literate late on in his career, Lü Meng has proved himself a most able scholar.
ceo_nodes.title: Late Scholar

description.last_approved_text: Ever the philanthropic diplomat, Lu Su’s affluence empowers his charitable nature.

ceo_nodes.description: Ever the philanthropic diplomat, Lu Su’s affluence empowers his charitable nature.
ceo_nodes.title: Charitable Envoy

description.last_approved_text: Equal parts brains and brawn, Lu Xun can oversee both civil and military matters.

ceo_nodes.description: Equal parts brains and brawn, Lu Xun can oversee both civil and military matters.
ceo_nodes.title: Scholar General

description.last_approved_text: With a complexion like jade and eyes like shooting stars, Ma Chao is a warrior truly brilliant in appearance.

ceo_nodes.description: With a complexion like jade and eyes like shooting stars, Ma Chao is a warrior truly brilliant in appearance.
ceo_nodes.title: Most-brilliant Warrior

description.last_approved_text: There are few things more important to Ma Dai than bloodline and family.

ceo_nodes.description: There are few things more important to Ma Dai than bloodline and family.
ceo_nodes.title: Fraternal Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Ma Teng may treat his friends well, but he remains merciless with the Han's enemies.

ceo_nodes.description: Ma Teng may treat his friends well, but he remains merciless with the Han's enemies.
ceo_nodes.title: Protector of the West

ceo_nodes.description: A brilliant general of Wei.Skillful in debates but also excelled as a strategist and tactician during many defensive battles. A close friend to Xu Huang, he recommended that he give his service to Cao Cao.
ceo_nodes.title: The Smiling Schemer

ceo_nodes.description: Few can implement effective policies with the efficiency of Mao Jie.
ceo_nodes.title: Efficient Bureaucrat

ceo_nodes.description: With his huge stature and exceptional strength, Meng Huo was both Nanzhong's king and its greatest warrior. Generally acting on emotion rather than thought, his fierce looks hid an underlying love and fear of his wife.
ceo_nodes.title: The Colossal King

description.last_approved_text: In these interesting times of fluctuating allegiances, the steadfast loyalty of Mi Zhu can always be relied upon.

ceo_nodes.description: In these interesting times of fluctuating allegiances, the steadfast loyalty of Mi Zhu can always be relied upon.
ceo_nodes.title: Dependable Administrator

description.last_approved_text: Pang De is an unrelenting force, whose avowed enemies know they must face him sooner or later.

ceo_nodes.description: Pang De is an unrelenting force, whose avowed enemies know they must face him sooner or later.
ceo_nodes.title: White Horse General

description.last_approved_text: Having risen from the ashes of obscurity, the 'Crown of Learned Men' is an advisor of the highest esteem.

ceo_nodes.description: Having risen from the ashes of obscurity, the 'Crown of Learned Men' is an advisor of the highest esteem.
ceo_nodes.title: Fledgling Phoenix

description.last_approved_text: Whether in charge of brigands or soldiers, one must lead by example, always riding at the head of the host.

ceo_nodes.description: Whether in charge of brigands or soldiers, one must lead by example, always riding at the head of the host.
ceo_nodes.title: Virtuous Outrider

ceo_nodes.description: Que Xuan considers himself the Son of Heaven, unfortunately for him most others do not.
ceo_nodes.title: Self Declared Emperor

ceo_nodes.description: Shen Pei might not be the best strategist, but his unbending will and loyalty to his lord can not be questioned
ceo_nodes.title: Unbending Vassal

ceo_nodes.description: Not happy to be ruled by others, Shi Hui is not quick to bend the knee.
ceo_nodes.title: Defiant Lord

description.last_approved_text: With his long and distinguished record of sophisticated service, Shi Xie is destined for stately eminence.

ceo_nodes.description: With his long and distinguished record of sophisticated service, Shi Xie is destined for stately eminence.
ceo_nodes.title: King Shi

ceo_nodes.description: As the eldest son of Sima Yi, his refined appearance and extraordinary talents earned him very high expectations from those around him. However, his self-righteous personality caused many to view him with a mixture of fear and respect.
ceo_nodes.title: The Prodigal Son

description.last_approved_text: "If you cannot fight, defend. If you cannot defend, flee. If you cannot flee, surrender. If you cannot surrender, die!"

ceo_nodes.description: "If you cannot fight, defend. If you cannot defend, flee. If you cannot flee, surrender. If you cannot surrender, die!"
ceo_nodes.title: Silver Eminence

ceo_nodes.description: As the second son of Sima Yi, he was often viewed as lacking when compared to his perfect brother, Sima Shi, due to his playful and happy-go-lucky personality. Despite this, he always remained focused on what was important during vital situations.
ceo_nodes.title: The Preordained

ceo_nodes.description: Sometimes fear is more helpful than bravery.
ceo_nodes.title: White Rabbit

description.last_approved_text: Sun Ce has been likened to the warrior-kings of old, with an aptitude for military leadership that belies his youth.

ceo_nodes.description: Sun Ce has been likened to the warrior-kings of old, with an aptitude for military leadership that belies his youth.
ceo_nodes.title: The Little Conqueror

description.last_approved_text: Claiming ancestry with the renowned military strategist Sun Tzu, the fearless Sun Jian has war flowing through his veins.

ceo_nodes.description: Claiming ancestry with the renowned military strategist Sun Tzu, the fearless Sun Jian has war flowing through his veins.
ceo_nodes.title: Tiger of Jiangdong

description.last_approved_text: Sun Qian’s word is an unwavering bond.

ceo_nodes.description: Sun Qian’s word is an unwavering bond.
ceo_nodes.title: Upstanding Loyalist

description.last_approved_text: Striking looks and a sturdy frame betokens Sun Quan’s great nobility, heroism and longevity.

ceo_nodes.description: Striking looks and a sturdy frame betokens Sun Quan’s great nobility, heroism and longevity.
ceo_nodes.title: Emerald-eyed Administrator

description.last_approved_text: From horse-riding to archery, Taishi Ci excels in all manner of physical pursuits.

ceo_nodes.description: From horse-riding to archery, Taishi Ci excels in all manner of physical pursuits.
ceo_nodes.title: of Exceptional Dexterity

description.last_approved_text: Tao Qian may be a highly influential and ambitious figure, but expansionism is not on his personal agenda.

ceo_nodes.description: Tao Qian may be a highly influential and ambitious figure, but expansionism is not on his personal agenda.
ceo_nodes.title: of the Sincere Jurisdiction

ceo_nodes.description: Consistently ignored despite giving good advice, Tian Feng's wasted efforts leave him undervalued.
ceo_nodes.title: Ignored Advisor

ceo_nodes.description: Wang Kuang often makes reckless decions without proper forethought.
ceo_nodes.title: Impetuous Warlord

description.last_approved_text: A keen imparter of knowledge, even when it is neither wanted nor welcome.

ceo_nodes.description: A keen imparter of knowledge, even when it is neither wanted nor welcome.
ceo_nodes.title: Ardent Educator

description.last_approved_text: Never can it be said that Wang Xiu was ever disloyal, dishonourable or unwilling to come to the aid of those he serves.

ceo_nodes.description: Never can it be said that Wang Xiu was ever disloyal, dishonourable or unwilling to come to the aid of those he serves.
ceo_nodes.title: The Righteous Hero

description.last_approved_text: For the distrustful Wei Yan, a violent betrayal always simmers below the surface.

ceo_nodes.description: For the distrustful Wei Yan, a violent betrayal always simmers below the surface.
ceo_nodes.title: Disobedient Tiger

description.last_approved_text: "If only Wen Chou were here, I’d have nothing to fear!"

ceo_nodes.description: "If only Wen Chou were here, I’d have nothing to fear!"
ceo_nodes.title: Fierce Firebrand

ceo_nodes.description: He had unprecedented courage and valor in battle, and his accomplishments on the battlefield were reminiscent of those of the great Zhao Yun.
ceo_nodes.title: Single Minded Purpose

ceo_nodes.description: As the son of Xiahou Yuan and a member of the Xiahou family, much was expected of him until his position grew unsteady as the political situation in Wei changed. Frequently garbed in armor and a helmet, he had an enigmatic, young look and a personality much like his father.
ceo_nodes.title: Steel Clad Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Those who know Xiahou Dun know not to get on his bad side.

ceo_nodes.description: Those who know Xiahou Dun know not to get on his bad side.
ceo_nodes.title: Hotheaded Officer

description.last_approved_text: "You really don't want to know what he did with his eye after losing it to that arrow…"

ceo_nodes.description: "You really don't want to know what he did with his eye after losing it to that arrow…"
ceo_nodes.title: The One-eyed Exile

description.last_approved_text: When it comes to military logistics, where there’s a will, Xiahou Yuan has a way.

ceo_nodes.description: When it comes to military logistics, where there’s a will, Xiahou Yuan has a way.
ceo_nodes.title: Maker of Ways

description.last_approved_text: Xu Chu is a man of simple thoughts and principles, but an impressive warrior who fights with a bestial rage.

ceo_nodes.description: Xu Chu is a man of simple thoughts and principles, but an impressive warrior who fights with a bestial rage.
ceo_nodes.title: Tiger Fool

description.last_approved_text: When assigned to guardianship, Xu Huang is an immovable sentinel, requiring a tremendous effort to bypass.

ceo_nodes.description: When assigned to guardianship, Xu Huang is an immovable sentinel, requiring a tremendous effort to bypass.
ceo_nodes.title: Guardian of the Gates

ceo_nodes.description: One must be mindful lest they let Xu Rong entrap them.
ceo_nodes.title: Shrewd Ambusher

ceo_nodes.description: A man with insight into one's personality, he will always give an honest and objective assesment of ones character.
ceo_nodes.title: Judge of Character

ceo_nodes.description: Serving as a military general of Sun Quan, he played a key role in the battles at Chibi, Hefei, and the in the invasion of Jing. He was known for his "fake towers" ruse which caused Cao Pi to retreat believing Sun Quan knew of his attack and had the city heavily fortified beforehand.
ceo_nodes.title: Charismatic Ruffian

description.last_approved_text: His body may be in one place, but his heart is in quite another.

ceo_nodes.description: His body may be in one place, but his heart is in quite another.
ceo_nodes.title: Disguised Diplomat

ceo_nodes.description: While his talents get him to positions of importance, his selfish greed finds him hated by his colleagues.
ceo_nodes.title: Corrupt Advisor

description.last_approved_text: A member of the learned scholar-gentry, Xun You is a profound thinker of great insight.

ceo_nodes.description: A member of the learned scholar-gentry, Xun You is a profound thinker of great insight.
ceo_nodes.title: Gentleman Attendant

description.last_approved_text: "Here comes my Zifang!"

ceo_nodes.description: "Here comes my Zifang!"
ceo_nodes.title: Hegemon's Aide

description.last_approved_text: A foremost general of considerable military prowess, the gutsy Yan Liang is unmatched among ordinary warriors.

ceo_nodes.description: A foremost general of considerable military prowess, the gutsy Yan Liang is unmatched among ordinary warriors.
ceo_nodes.title: Valiant Vanguard

ceo_nodes.description: Yan Pu has great foresight and planning, one would do well do to heed his advice.
ceo_nodes.title: Prudent Advisor

ceo_nodes.description: The deep seated greed of Yang Song can never be sated.
ceo_nodes.title: Avaricious Official

description.last_approved_text: As an imperious, by-the-book disciplinarian, Yu Jin rules his subordinates with fear and drilled-in obedience.

ceo_nodes.description: As an imperious, by-the-book disciplinarian, Yu Jin rules his subordinates with fear and drilled-in obedience.
ceo_nodes.title: Enforcer of the Law

ceo_nodes.description: Yuan Shang may be self absorbed, but there is no doubt he truly cuts a dashing figure.
ceo_nodes.title: Dashing Commander

description.last_approved_text: Yuan Shao's astuteness, dignity and arrogance are the mark of his ancestors, many of whom served emperors past.

ceo_nodes.description: Yuan Shao's astuteness, dignity and arrogance are the mark of his ancestors, many of whom served emperors past.
ceo_nodes.title: Preeminent Commander

description.last_approved_text: Yuan Shu is an ambitious but overconfident individual – time will tell whether such qualities shall trip him or aid his desires.

ceo_nodes.description: Yuan Shu is an ambitious but overconfident individual – time will tell whether such qualities shall trip him or aid his desires.
ceo_nodes.title: Ambitious Powermonger

ceo_nodes.description: Yuan Tan will rule one day, one way or the other.
ceo_nodes.title: Arrogant Noble

ceo_nodes.description: Sidelined by his brothers in his fathers eyes, Yuan Xi is filled with envy and resenment
ceo_nodes.title: Self Important Wastrel

description.last_approved_text: What Yue Jin lacks in stature he makes up for in fierceness, fearlessness, and deadliness with his bow.

ceo_nodes.description: What Yue Jin lacks in stature he makes up for in fierceness, fearlessness, and deadliness with his bow.
ceo_nodes.title: The Lion of Yangping

ceo_nodes.description: Zang Ba is a man who follows his heart, even when it leads him into trouble.
ceo_nodes.title: Valiant Brigand

ceo_nodes.description: The handsome Zang Hong was the one to proclaim the oath made during the creation of the anti-Dong Zhuo alliance
ceo_nodes.title: Proclaimer of the Oath

ceo_nodes.description: While Ze Rong claims to be a Buddhist his greed, cruelty and deceit prove him a hypocrite.
ceo_nodes.title: False Buddhist

ceo_nodes.description: As the son of Zhang Fei, he grew to be as skilled in battle as his father. Along with his brother-in-law, Guan Xing, his skills were proven to be a valuable asset in the many battles in the Northern Campaign. With a strong sense of responsibility, he often enjoyed taking care of others.
ceo_nodes.title: Man of Passion

description.last_approved_text: Such graceful skills with ink and brush are the mark a man of great education and scholarly puissance.

ceo_nodes.description: Such graceful skills with ink and brush are the mark a man of great education and scholarly puissance.
ceo_nodes.title: Flowing Calligrapher

description.last_approved_text: "Hold my wine…"

ceo_nodes.description: "Hold my wine…"
ceo_nodes.title: Drunken Brawler

description.last_approved_text: Zhang He’s fearlessness enables him to retain his composure when having to adapt to unfavourable situations.

ceo_nodes.description: Zhang He’s fearlessness enables him to retain his composure when having to adapt to unfavourable situations.
ceo_nodes.title: Courageous General

ceo_nodes.description: As a practitioner of Taiping Dao he spread his teachings to the people, and gained their support by capitalizing on the times of turmoil. He formed the Yellow Turbans to oppose the rapidly decaying Han Imperial Court, and styled himself as the "General of Heaven." His philosophical style and singular presence gave his movement a rather unique feel to it.
ceo_nodes.title: Channeler of Heaven

description.last_approved_text: "The unjust rulers of the old regime shall perish."

ceo_nodes.description: "The unjust rulers of the old regime shall perish."
ceo_nodes.title: Slayer of Tyrants

description.last_approved_text: The model of professionalism and organisation, Zhang Liao has heavenly leadership skills.

ceo_nodes.description: The model of professionalism and organisation, Zhang Liao has heavenly leadership skills.
ceo_nodes.title: The Heavenly Dragon General

description.last_approved_text: Just as water penetrates mountains, Zhang Lu always seeks to overcome hardness by his own accord.

ceo_nodes.description: Just as water penetrates mountains, Zhang Lu always seeks to overcome hardness by his own accord.
ceo_nodes.title: Celestial Master

ceo_nodes.description: While Zhang Miao is beloved by many for his kindness and generosity, he is also cowardly and opportunistic.
ceo_nodes.title: Cowardly Benefactor

description.last_approved_text: With his scores of followers, the bandit leader known as 'Flying Swallow' wields the influence of a king.

ceo_nodes.description: With his scores of followers, the bandit leader known as 'Flying Swallow' wields the influence of a king.
ceo_nodes.title: King of Black Mountain

description.last_approved_text: What is the fate of he who is forsaken and unjustly distrusted by his fellow warlords? Only heaven knows.

ceo_nodes.description: What is the fate of he who is forsaken and unjustly distrusted by his fellow warlords? Only heaven knows.
ceo_nodes.title: Ignored Warlord

description.last_approved_text: In the darkest times of war, the auras of the most resplendent warriors gleam brightest.

ceo_nodes.description: In the darkest times of war, the auras of the most resplendent warriors gleam brightest.
ceo_nodes.title: Light in the Dark

description.last_approved_text: Hell-bent on plunder, Zheng Jiang goes to unspeakable lengths to obtain her loot.

ceo_nodes.description: Hell-bent on plunder, Zheng Jiang goes to unspeakable lengths to obtain her loot.
ceo_nodes.title: Bandit Queen

ceo_nodes.description: Zhong Hui became a general at a very young age, and considered Deng Ai as his rival. Extremely talented, he enjoyed battles, but was not trusted by older generals due to his overconfidence.
ceo_nodes.title: Precocious Talent

ceo_nodes.description: Follower of Zhang Bao, former leader of the Yellow Turbans.While operating as a bandit at Mt. Woniu he encounters Guan Yu, whom he admired, and swore his loyalty to Guan Yu.An agile officer, it was often said that not only was he a gifted swimmer, he could run a thousand leagues in a day, a feat comparable to Red Hare.
ceo_nodes.title: Agile Warrior

description.last_approved_text: His scar-riddled skin is a canvas of stories, telling of countless bloody battles past.

ceo_nodes.description: His scar-riddled skin is a canvas of stories, telling of countless bloody battles past.
ceo_nodes.title: Man of Many Scars

description.last_approved_text: "If there is a mistake in the tune, Zhou Yu will look up."

ceo_nodes.description: "If there is a mistake in the tune, Zhou Yu will look up."
ceo_nodes.title: Melodic Strategist

ceo_nodes.description: An officer who was a classmate of Sun Quan's, he was promoted within the Wu ranks. Although young, he distinguished himself in the suppression of a group of mountain bandits and during the Battle of Ruxukou. An officer entrusted with the future of Wu, those around him had high expectations for his potential.
ceo_nodes.title: The Crimson Lotus

ceo_nodes.description: While Zhuge Liang was "the Dragon" and Zhuge Jin was "the Tiger," this young officer was jokingly called "the Dog." Through hard work, he gained a high reputation for his service to Wei. He was extremely serious and had a strong sense of right and wrong, but he had trouble considering the big picture as his focus was very narrow.
ceo_nodes.title: The Dog

description.last_approved_text: Having studied history and poetry in years past, Zhuge Jin is a man who appreciates scholarship.

ceo_nodes.description: Having studied history and poetry in years past, Zhuge Jin is a man who appreciates scholarship.
ceo_nodes.title: Bookish Scholar

description.last_approved_text: A peerless genius and insightful strategist, there are few situations that Zhuge Liang’s astute intellect cannot overcome.

ceo_nodes.description: A peerless genius and insightful strategist, there are few situations that Zhuge Liang’s astute intellect cannot overcome.
ceo_nodes.title: Sleeping Dragon

ceo_nodes.description: Zuo Ci had the ability to use sorcery to perform supernatural miracles. He lamented the chaos that enveloped the world, and hoped for the virtuous Liu Bei to bring forth a new age of peace.
ceo_nodes.title: Miraculous Sage

description.last_approved_text: Born into the gentry, this one has long since acclimatised to the myriad affairs of regional government.

ceo_nodes.description: Born into the gentry, this one has long since acclimatised to the myriad affairs of regional government.
ceo_nodes.title: Noble

description.last_approved_text: Having trained in martial matters from a young age, combat and warfare has become a way of life.

ceo_nodes.description: Having trained in martial matters from a young age, combat and warfare has become a way of life.
ceo_nodes.title: Soldier

description.last_approved_text: A skilled professional who knows their trade inside out.

ceo_nodes.description: A skilled professional who knows their trade inside out.
ceo_nodes.title: Artisan

ceo_nodes.description: Hidden trait for Colonels and Captains. If you see this please let design know.
ceo_nodes.title: Transitive

description.last_approved_text: An expert in both overt and covert politicking, this one always seems to be on some form of decreed business.

ceo_nodes.description: An expert in both overt and covert politicking, this one always seems to be on some form of decreed business.
ceo_nodes.title: Official

description.last_approved_text: Born and bred in the villages of the countryside, peasants know the plants, the soil and the forests.

ceo_nodes.description: Born and bred in the villages of the countryside, peasants know the plants, the soil and the forests.
ceo_nodes.title: Peasant

description.last_approved_text: Women can lift half the sky.

ceo_nodes.description: Women can lift half the sky.
ceo_nodes.title: Female

description.last_approved_text: All men are brothers, they are simply divided by fears and interests.

ceo_nodes.description: All men are brothers, they are simply divided by fears and interests.
ceo_nodes.title: Male

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: Blessed or cursed, such is the will of heaven.
ceo_nodes.title: Legendary

ceo_nodes.description: HIDDEN
ceo_nodes.title: Protagonist

ceo_nodes.description: HIDDEN
ceo_nodes.title: Proponent

ceo_nodes.description: HIDDEN
ceo_nodes.title: Prime Mover

description.last_approved_text: Never indulging in excess, this one's watchword is moderation.

ceo_nodes.description: Never indulging in excess, this one's watchword is moderation.
ceo_nodes.title: Ascetic

description.last_approved_text: This one desires the world, and will go to dangerous lengths to obtain it.

ceo_nodes.description: This one desires the world, and will go to dangerous lengths to obtain it.
ceo_nodes.title: Ambitious

description.last_approved_text: Not egotistical, per se, they just see the inferiority in everyone else.

ceo_nodes.description: Not egotistical, per se, they just see the inferiority in everyone else.
ceo_nodes.title: Arrogant

description.last_approved_text: This one sees a remarkable acumen in finding means for their ends.

ceo_nodes.description: This one sees a remarkable acumen in finding means for their ends.
ceo_nodes.title: Artful

description.last_approved_text: There is a fine line between fearlessness and foolishness, and this one is no fool.

ceo_nodes.description: There is a fine line between fearlessness and foolishness, and this one is no fool.
ceo_nodes.title: Brave

description.last_approved_text: A perennial high-achiever, excelling above others in most of their endeavours.

ceo_nodes.description: A perennial high-achiever, excelling above others in most of their endeavours.
ceo_nodes.title: Brilliant

description.last_approved_text: This person commits to action without spending too much time in thought beforehand.

ceo_nodes.description: This person commits to action without spending too much time in thought beforehand.
ceo_nodes.title: Careless

description.last_approved_text: The enlightened are always heedful, the good full of caution.

ceo_nodes.description: The enlightened are always heedful, the good full of caution.
ceo_nodes.title: Cautious

description.last_approved_text: Entranced by this one’s personal charm, people hang on their every word.

ceo_nodes.description: Entranced by this one’s personal charm, people hang on their every word.
ceo_nodes.title: Charismatic

description.last_approved_text: This one has a true desire to be generous and useful to others, without a single thought of recompense.

ceo_nodes.description: This one has a true desire to be generous and useful to others, without a single thought of recompense.
ceo_nodes.title: Charitable

description.last_approved_text: An intelligent thinker, who learns and adapts quicker than others.

ceo_nodes.description: An intelligent thinker, who learns and adapts quicker than others.
ceo_nodes.title: Clever

description.last_approved_text: This highly-competitive individual relishes one-upmanship at every turn.

ceo_nodes.description: This highly-competitive individual relishes one-upmanship at every turn.
ceo_nodes.title: Competitive

description.last_approved_text: At even the slightest hint of danger, this one thinks mostly with their legs.

ceo_nodes.description: At even the slightest hint of danger, this one thinks mostly with their legs.
ceo_nodes.title: Cowardly

description.last_approved_text: Wholly indifferent to the pain and suffering of others, this one likely enjoys it.

ceo_nodes.description: Wholly indifferent to the pain and suffering of others, this one likely enjoys it.
ceo_nodes.title: Cruel

description.last_approved_text: This one always either has a plan or is in the process of devising one.

description.last_approved_text: A bold and charismatic voice can make even the smallest proclamation sound profound and inspiring.

ceo_nodes.description: This person introduces others to the Tao and helps them take their first steps with it.

description.last_approved_text: One can educate without being a great teacher, but this one recognises that each pupil has different needs and addresses them.

ceo_nodes.description: One can educate without being a great teacher, but this one recognises that each pupil has different needs and addresses them.
ceo_nodes.title: Great Teacher

description.last_approved_text: Enlightenment is a never-ending journey, but this one is close enough to instruct other teachers.

ceo_nodes.description: Enlightenment is a never-ending journey, but this one is close enough to instruct other teachers.
ceo_nodes.title: Master Teacher

description.last_approved_text: This one’s wisdom is such that many old pupils return to them for advice.

ceo_nodes.description: This one’s wisdom is such that many old pupils return to them for advice.
ceo_nodes.title: Wise Teacher

description.last_approved_text: "I have just what you need in a beautiful little volume… Now, where did I put it again?"

ceo_nodes.description: "I have just what you need in a beautiful little volume… Now, where did I put it again?"
ceo_nodes.title: All-knowing Teacher

description.last_approved_text: This one knows every ritual, song and practice written in the Tao and has the expertise to perform them.

ceo_nodes.description: This one knows every ritual, song and practice written in the Tao and has the expertise to perform them.
ceo_nodes.title: Taoist Priest

description.last_approved_text: Ultimate wisdom is accepting that, as your knowledge grows, deeper mysteries will open up before you.

ceo_nodes.description: Ultimate wisdom is accepting that, as your knowledge grows, deeper mysteries will open up before you.
ceo_nodes.title: Xian

description.last_approved_text: Our leader declared themselves emperor. They have enacted many military reforms and made us significantly more powerful.

ceo_nodes.description: Our leader declared themselves emperor. They have enacted many military reforms and made us significantly more powerful.
ceo_nodes.title: Yellow Sky Emperor

description.last_approved_text: This person performs acts of compassion far beyond what is expected of mere etiquette, proving that their heart and deeds are genuine.

ceo_nodes.description: This person performs acts of compassion far beyond what is expected of mere etiquette, proving that their heart and deeds are genuine.
ceo_nodes.title: Gracious

description.last_approved_text: Respect earned from kindness has deep roots, whereas that forced from fear lives on shifting sands.

ceo_nodes.description: Respect earned from kindness has deep roots, whereas that forced from fear lives on shifting sands.
ceo_nodes.title: Kind-hearted

description.last_approved_text: This person can find a use for things others would discard without thinking, so nothing is wasted.

ceo_nodes.description: This person can find a use for things others would discard without thinking, so nothing is wasted.
ceo_nodes.title: Bright

description.last_approved_text: When a problem confounds other more practically-minded people, this one applies imagination and innovation to find the answer.

ceo_nodes.description: When a problem confounds other more practically-minded people, this one applies imagination and innovation to find the answer.
ceo_nodes.title: Creative

description.last_approved_text: This one believes that to be rich and powerful at the expense of their soul is a fool’s deal, and unworthy of consideration.

ceo_nodes.description: This one believes that to be rich and powerful at the expense of their soul is a fool’s deal, and unworthy of consideration.
ceo_nodes.title: Honest

description.last_approved_text: By putting others before themselves, this one achieves peace and humility, acting as an example to us all.

ceo_nodes.description: By putting others before themselves, this one achieves peace and humility, acting as an example to us all.
ceo_nodes.title: Selfless

description.last_approved_text: This one affects ignorance to small misdemeanours, as a little dipping into the pot every now and then keeps the peace.

ceo_nodes.description: This one affects ignorance to small misdemeanours, as a little dipping into the pot every now and then keeps the peace.
ceo_nodes.title: Tolerant

description.last_approved_text: This one is as calm as a still lake; their thoughts possess a mindful clarity and they perform their tasks all the better for it.

ceo_nodes.description: This one is as calm as a still lake; their thoughts possess a mindful clarity and they perform their tasks all the better for it.
ceo_nodes.title: Tranquil

description.last_approved_text: When others are lost, it is this one’s advice they seek out first.

ceo_nodes.description: When others are lost, it is this one’s advice they seek out first.
ceo_nodes.title: Wise

description.last_approved_text: This one uncannily evades blows as if they are forewarned of each one.

ceo_nodes.description: This one uncannily evades blows as if they are forewarned of each one.
ceo_nodes.title: Vigilant

description.last_approved_text: Like an arrow, this one is ever-moving towards one goal, sweeping up many others in their wake.

ceo_nodes.description: Like an arrow, this one is ever-moving towards one goal, sweeping up many others in their wake.
ceo_nodes.title: Committed

description.last_approved_text: Whenever tragedy strikes, this one remains untroubled and acts as an anchor for others with reason and clear thinking.

ceo_nodes.description: Whenever tragedy strikes, this one remains untroubled and acts as an anchor for others with reason and clear thinking.
ceo_nodes.title: Composed

description.last_approved_text: True courage comes from refusing to let fear paralyse you from righteous action, not in denying you feel it to save face.

ceo_nodes.description: True courage comes from refusing to let fear paralyse you from righteous action, not in denying you feel it to save face.
ceo_nodes.title: Intrepid

description.last_approved_text: This person has few belongings and refuses luxuries to be free of material concerns and focus on the needs of others.

ceo_nodes.description: This person has few belongings and refuses luxuries to be free of material concerns and focus on the needs of others.
ceo_nodes.title: Philanthropic

description.last_approved_text: "Show me a warrior that can match my strength and I shall exchange my sword and steed for a spade and plough!"

ceo_nodes.description: "Show me a warrior that can match my strength and I shall exchange my sword and steed for a spade and plough!"
ceo_nodes.title: Formidable

description.last_approved_text: Harmony comes from accepting things as they are; seeking change within the natural order instead of forcing it.

ceo_nodes.description: Harmony comes from accepting things as they are; seeking change within the natural order instead of forcing it.
ceo_nodes.title: Fulfilled

description.last_approved_text: Many speak highly of this person, for they are a pleasure to be around and conversation with them is effortless.

ceo_nodes.description: Many speak highly of this person, for they are a pleasure to be around and conversation with them is effortless.
ceo_nodes.title: Cordial

description.last_approved_text: It is easy to be cynical, but this one remains open to beauty and hope and their optimism is infectious.

ceo_nodes.description: It is easy to be cynical, but this one remains open to beauty and hope and their optimism is infectious.
ceo_nodes.title: Cheerful

description.last_approved_text: This person is not content to simply nod sadly about other people’s troubles but goes out of their way to solve them.

ceo_nodes.description: This person is not content to simply nod sadly about other people’s troubles but goes out of their way to solve them.
ceo_nodes.title: Concerned

description.last_approved_text: This one’s doors are always open, and the tea is always hot.

ceo_nodes.description: This one’s doors are always open, and the tea is always hot.
ceo_nodes.title: Friendly

description.last_approved_text: This shrewd individual anticipates and meets the wants of the people, even before they know them themselves!

ceo_nodes.description: This shrewd individual anticipates and meets the wants of the people, even before they know them themselves!
ceo_nodes.title: Populist

description.last_approved_text: An absolute belief in their own ideals as opposed to all others makes this person inflexible and lacking in sympathy.

ceo_nodes.description: An absolute belief in their own ideals as opposed to all others makes this person inflexible and lacking in sympathy.
ceo_nodes.title: Stern

description.last_approved_text: To help others without being sanctimonious and dismissing what may seem trivial demonstrates true empathy.

ceo_nodes.description: To help others without being sanctimonious and dismissing what may seem trivial demonstrates true empathy.
ceo_nodes.title: Understanding

description.last_approved_text: When this one falls, he who strikes the final blow should dig the grave deeply, for some say even death will not stop them.

ceo_nodes.description: When this one falls, he who strikes the final blow should dig the grave deeply, for some say even death will not stop them.
ceo_nodes.title: Relentless

description.last_approved_text: The Tao talks of the usefulness of empty spaces, but the vacuum between this person’s ears may be going too far.

ceo_nodes.description: The Tao talks of the usefulness of empty spaces, but the vacuum between this person’s ears may be going too far.
ceo_nodes.title: Uncomplicated

description.last_approved_text: Like a mountain, this one does not strive for greatness, but achieves it by simply being dependable to those that need them.

ceo_nodes.description: Like a mountain, this one does not strive for greatness, but achieves it by simply being dependable to those that need them.
ceo_nodes.title: Stalwart

description.last_approved_text: If told that everyone needed air to live, this person would hold their breath until they passed out.

ceo_nodes.description: If told that everyone needed air to live, this person would hold their breath until they passed out.
ceo_nodes.title: Obstinate

description.last_approved_text: Trying to predict this one’s moods is like trying to close shave with a sword, and every bit as unsettling.

ceo_nodes.description: Trying to predict this one’s moods is like trying to close shave with a sword, and every bit as unsettling.
ceo_nodes.title: Temperamental

description.last_approved_text: An open and honest face makes it easier to be places where you shouldn’t and hear confidences meant for other ears.

ceo_nodes.description: An open and honest face makes it easier to be places where you shouldn’t and hear confidences meant for other ears.
ceo_nodes.title: Trustworthy

description.last_approved_text: For this person the thrill of a vindictive word or deed as it hits home is as pleasing as a beautiful sunset.

ceo_nodes.description: For this person the thrill of a vindictive word or deed as it hits home is as pleasing as a beautiful sunset.
ceo_nodes.title: Spiteful

description.last_approved_text: A sword will cut one man down, but dread is like a fire that grows and spreads the more it consumes.

ceo_nodes.description: A sword will cut one man down, but dread is like a fire that grows and spreads the more it consumes.
ceo_nodes.title: Feared

description.last_approved_text: There is no way to protect everyone from harm, only to be on hand with compassion to heal them.

ceo_nodes.description: There is no way to protect everyone from harm, only to be on hand with compassion to heal them.
ceo_nodes.title: Healer of People

description.last_approved_text: This person is fastidious in their appearance, demonstrating an attention to detail that inspires confidence in others.

ceo_nodes.description: This person is fastidious in their appearance, demonstrating an attention to detail that inspires confidence in others.
ceo_nodes.title: Impeccable

description.last_approved_text: The people need someone to unite them, and this one has the leadership skills to do it.

ceo_nodes.description: The people need someone to unite them, and this one has the leadership skills to do it.

description.last_approved_text: This one recognises China as the people and does everything in their power to safeguard them.

ceo_nodes.description: This one recognises China as the people and does everything in their power to safeguard them.

description.last_approved_text: The enemy that injured this 'valiant warrior' was a rock that tripped them as they fled the battle. More of a pebble, in fact.

ceo_nodes.description: The enemy that injured this 'valiant warrior' was a rock that tripped them as they fled the battle. More of a pebble, in fact.

ceo_nodes.description: "When a man bleeds, it’s just tissue."

description.last_approved_text: Heaven has surely blessed this one, for a serious wound inflicted upon them in battle has healed without even leaving a scar or mark!

ceo_nodes.description: Heaven has surely blessed this one, for a serious wound inflicted upon them in battle has healed without even leaving a scar or mark!

ceo_nodes.description: A war injury still vexes this person when the seasons turn bitter, and may still cause further misery for them.

ceo_nodes.description: Not much to look at, but it's got it where it matters.

ceo_nodes.description: Plates so resistant you would think them the hide of a winged-beast.

ceo_nodes.description: This armour is an extension of the self; defence flows through it, to the wearer.

ceo_nodes.description: It would be easier to split the very ground than this armour.

ceo_nodes.description: This armour is as a second skin, although considerably firmer.

ceo_nodes.description: Longevity is granted to those who offer devotion to the blossoms.

ceo_nodes.description: "Dignity and understanding, friend. That is how we win."

ceo_nodes.description: Functional, but masterfully-forged armour for the warrior of renown.

ceo_nodes.description: Hardened shell to defend against man, nature and heaven.

ceo_nodes.description: Possessed of the same alacrity and fighting-joy as its namesake.

ceo_nodes.description: Provides the wearer ample defence and a preternatural disposition for conflict.

ceo_nodes.description: There is wisdom in this armour. Wisdom its wearer will now also possess.

ceo_nodes.description: "There is a difference between knowing the path and walking the path."
